snippet.title: DOOM 87: The Lost World (Beta Release)
snippet.description:
"The hellspawn invasions just keep coming.  How many times must Doomguy revisit Hell before the demonic army is defeated?  Perhaps he's been missing something.  Maybe Hell is only a decoy.  What if their real base has yet to be found?  The search begins now..."

A 21 map beta release of the upcoming vanilla DOOM II megawad, "DOOM 87: The Lost World," is now available!  Download the DOOM 87 beta release today and start your epic DOOMING adventure :D
https://www.doomworld.com/applications/core/interface/file/attachment.php?id=110229

DCG Retrowave's official website
http://dcgretrowave.com/
